pageContent: Purpose: To evaluate the effects of external beam radiotherapy (EBRT), with or without brachytherapy (BT) boost or brachytherapy monotherapy with and without short-term androgen ablation (<==6 months; STAD) on sexual function (SF) and sexual bother (SB) in men treated for localized prostate cancer.

metaData.source:
Defining potency: a comparison of the International Index of Erectile Function short version and the Expanded Prostate Cancer Index Composite
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/18816628/
